attributes.action: Abolish the right of Legal aid to repeat offenders (Three Strikes and you're out) in order to save money being wasted which could be better spent
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The present system typically allows criminal to have unlimited public money via the legal aid scheme to put up representation in our courts. It is totally impracticable to allow this to continue. It is obvious to anyone that, given the current legal aid system, solicitors are encouraged to request innumerable adjournments for these repeat offenders merely to increase the amount of legal aid they collect.
Altering the system to 3 strikes & you're out would vastly improve the system.
